resources.string: Welcome to bedrockR Mobile! Below are your addons. Have none? Create a one with the button above.
The workspace %1$s was not found on the disk.

This project does not currently have Minecraft Sync enabled. Minecraft Sync automatically copies your built project files into com.mojang, so you can build, and playtest without needing to restart the game. \n\n WARNING: You need to set your storage mode to External in Minecraft, or bedrockR cannot access Minecraft\'s files.
To use Minecraft Sync, bedrockR Mobile needs access to Minecraft\'s files. Do you want to grant those permissions\?
Minecraft Sync is now enabled. You only need to reload your world to test now! (after you build of course!)
Failed to enable MC sync. Do you have the game installed? If you do, report this as a bug. Disabling Minecraft sync.
